data.name: Universe For Sale
data.detailed_description:
Universe for Sale is a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor.
Walk through Jupiter's bazaars, meet absurd characters with incredible stories to tell, and craft your own stories with Lila's power to create custom universes.

  • Immerse yourself through a picturesque, full hand-drawn world, highly inspired by the European's sci-fi comics.



  • Discover the past of mysterious characters and religions to achieve enlightenment.



  • Relax with an original soundtrack composed by Guglielmo Diana.



  • Create and sell personalized universes in a chill-out atmosphere.

data.short_description: Universe for Sale is a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance, follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist and Lila the universes vendor.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i-3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with more than 2GB of Storage Space.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics card with more than 4GB of Storage Space.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.14 or more
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 1536mb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.14 or more
  • Processor: Intel Core i-7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5300M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
